# webpack-show-assets-table

[![GitHub license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/AliakseyenkaIhar/webpack-show-assets-table)](https://github.com/AliakseyenkaIhar/webpack-show-assets-table/blob/master/LICENSE) [![GitHub release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/AliakseyenkaIhar/webpack-show-assets-table)](https://gitHub.com/AliakseynkaIhar/webpack-show-assets-table/releases/) ![Safe](https://img.shields.io/badge/Stay-Safe-red?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)

Display compiled assets by webpack in an elegant table view.

## Getting started

Install `webpack-show-assets-table`:
```sh
npm i -D webpack-show-assets-table
```

Then add it as a plugin to your webpack config.

**webpack.config.js**
```js
const ShowAssetsTablePlugin = require('webpack-show-assets-table');

module.exports = {
    ...
    plugins: [
        new ShowAssetsTablePlugin()
    ]
};
```
